metadata.titleEn: Deep prediction and evaluation of porphyry metallogenic system in the eastern Gangdese and optimal data set of target area
metadata.titleCn: 冈底斯东段斑岩成矿系统深部预测评价与靶区优选数据集
metadata.descriptionCn:
数据集包含如下信息：
1、	通过第三方检测产生的锆石U-Pb年龄及微量元素数据谱数据；
2、	通过第三方检测产生的全岩和单矿物Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf-S-Pb-H-O同位素地球化学数据；
3、	通过第三方检测产生的Rb-Sr、Sm-Nd同位素数据；
4、	通过第三方检测产生的黄铁矿、磁黄铁矿、绿泥石等主微量元素数据； 
5、	通过第三方检测产生的流体包裹体微量元素及显微测温数据；
6、	通过第三方检测产生的矿物原位主量和微量元素数据；
7、	通过第三方检测产生的岩矿石地球化学数据；
8、	通过第三方检测产生的云母的40Ar/39Ar数据；
9、	项目组野外地质调查获得的西藏重点矿区蚀变-构造填图数据；
10、项目组野外实测宽频带地震观测数据、短周期密集台阵观测数据，及提取的接收函数数据；
以上数据采集地点为西藏和云南地区。主要在中国地质科学院矿产资源研究所、中国科学院地球化学研究所、中国科学院地质与地球物理研究所、核工业北京地质研究院分析测试研究所、北京大学、南京大学、合肥工业大学资源与环境工程学院实验室、武汉上谱实验室、南京大学矿床研究国家重点实验室、中国科学院广州地球化学研究所同位素地球化学国家重点实验室、矿物与成矿学重点实验室、中国地质大学（北京）、中国地质大学（武汉）、国家地质实验测试中心、澳实分析检测广州有限公司、北京科荟测试技术有限公司、加拿大哥伦比亚大学太平洋同位素和地球化学研究中心惰性气体实验室、加拿大女王大学的女王同位素研究中心和加拿大纪念大学微量分析实验室等实验室完成测试分析。使用的仪器包括agilent7500a-ICP-MS仪器、Redmond Photon Machines Analyte G2激光剥蚀-多接收器-电感耦合等离子体质谱仪、Rigaku RIX 2000 spectrometer X荧光光谱仪、JEOL JXA-8100 电子探针、Shimadzu Sequential 1800 spectrometer X荧光光谱仪、Obitraq Fusion高通量质谱测序仪、JEOL JCXA-733电子探针、Finnigan Triton热电离质谱仪、Argus VI惰性气体质谱仪、HORIBA XPLORA PLUS 型显微共焦激光拉曼光谱仪、CAMECA IMS-1280二次离子质谱仪(SIMS)、GV-5400质谱仪，JEOL8800M电子探针，Rigaku RIX 2000 spectrometer X荧光光谱仪、Nu Plasma II MC-ICP-MS、Zeiss V16、V20体式显微镜，扫描电子显微镜、COMPexPro 102 ArF 193 nm准分子激光器和MicroLas光学系统组成、WSP-1型光谱仪、Photon Machine公司的 Analyte HE仪、compex102F 193nm准分子激光器、Axios PW4400 X射线荧光光谱仪、Perkin-Elmer ICP-MS仪器、Finnigan MAT‐262热电离质谱仪（TIMS）、ELEMENT-2质谱仪、JEOL-JXA-8230M电子探针、TJAX系列ICP-MS、多接收电感耦合等离子质谱(MC-ICPMS)等。采集时间为2018-2021年。
metadata.instructions:
File name: deep prediction and evaluation of porphyry metallogenic system in the eastern Gangdise and target optimization data are stored in various formats. The file naming rules are place name + deposit name (research object) + technical means.
Data reading method: the data set includes CDR, MAPGIS, word, AI, PDF and other formats, and all files can be opened directly
metadata.instructionsCn:
文件命名：冈底斯东段斑岩成矿系统深部预测评价与靶区优选数据以多种格式存储。文件命名规则为地名+矿床名称（研究对象）+技术手段。

数据读取方式：该数据集中的包括CDR，Mapgis，Word，Ai，PDF等格式，所有文件均可直接打开

literatureList.titleEn: Hydrothermal evolution and ore precipitation of the No. 2 porphyry Cu–Au deposit in the Xiongcun district, Tibet: Evidence from cathodoluminescence, fluid inclusions, and isotopes

Hydrothermal evolution and ore precipitation of the No. 2 porphyry Cu–Au deposit in the Xiongcun district, Tibet: Evidence from cathodoluminescence, fluid inclusions, and isotopes. Ore Geology Reviews, 114, 103141.

literatureList.titleEn: Early–Middle Jurassic (182–170 Ma) Ruocuo adakitic porphyries, southern margin of the Lhasa terrane, Tibet: Implications for geodynamic setting and porphyry Cu–Au mineralization

Early–Middle Jurassic (182–170 Ma) Ruocuo adakitic porphyries, southern margin of the Lhasa terrane, Tibet: Implications for geodynamic setting and porphyry Cu–Au mineralization. Journal of Asian Earth Sciences, 173, 336-351.

background: The Tibetan Plateau includes, from north to south, the Qiangtang, Lhasa, and Himalaya terranes, and has a complex geological history. The Lhasa terrane is an important constituent of the Tibetan Plateau, and underwent a complicated series of subduction events during the formation and consumption of the Neo-Tethys and the subsequent collision between India and Asia. The early Mesozoic igneous rocks in the southern Lhasa subterrane previously regard as a result of southward subduction of the Bangong-Nujiang oceanic lithosphere. In recent years, however, there are growing evidences that they formed in northward subduction of the Neo-Tethyan slab. The Sangri Group, which is found within the central–eastern segment of the southern Lhasa subterrane, is important because it is regarded as a product of early Neo-Tethyan subduction. The volcanic–sedimentary sequence of the Sangri Group is irregularly distributed within the central–eastern segment of the southern Lhasa subterrane, where it trends E–W for ~800 km from Sangri to Saga counties. The characteristics of the sedimentary sequence and types of fossils indicate that the Sangri Group was deposited in a nearshore or shallow sea environment on a continental shelf. The volcanic rocks of the Mamuxia Formation are a 1500-m-thick sequence of basaltic andesites, andesites, and dacites with adakite-like geochemical signatures.
research objective: In this paper, we report zircon U\\Pb ages, whole-rock major and trace element data, and Sr–Nd–Pb–Hf isotopic compositions of BF volcanic rocks (BFVRs) from the central segment of the southern Lhasa subterrane. Our results, combined with those of recent studies of the eastern segment of the southern Lhasa subterrane, provide improved constraints on the evolution of the Neo-Tethys in southern Tibet during the early Mesozoic, and a better understanding of the geodynamic setting and evolution of the southern Lhasa subterrane.
challenges: Unfortunately, little is known of the evolution of the Neo-Tethys, particularly with respect to its early history during the early Mesozoic.
methods: After petrographic examination, five samples (D01.1, D13.1, NX-1.1, NMDZ04-1, and DZK06-1) were selected for zircon U\\Pb dating by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA–ICP–MS), and four of these samples (D01.1, D13.1, NX-1.1, and DZK06-1) were selected for zircon Hf isotopic analysis. Twenty-three samples (D01.1, D01.2, D03.1, D03.2, D04, D10, D13.1, D13.2, XWY-1 to -6, NX-1.1, NX-1.2, Bn06, D0203, D0204, NMDZ04-1, NMDZ04-2, DZK06-1, and DZK06-2) were selected for major and trace element analysis. Among them, nine samples (XWY-1, XWY-2, XWY-3, XWY-5, XWY-6, D03.1, D04, NX-1.1, and D13.2) were also selected for Sr\\Nd isotopic analysis, and five samples (XWY-1, XWY-2, XWY-3, XWY-5, and XWY-6) were further selected for Pb isotopic analysis.
findings: Therefore, combining our new data with those of Kang et al. (2014) and Wang et al. (2016), we propose that the BF formed in the Middle Triassic to Early Jurassic rather than the Early Cretaceous.
backgroundCn: 青藏高原包括从北到南的羌塘、拉萨和喜马拉雅地块，具有复杂的地质历史。拉萨地块是青藏高原的重要组成部分，在新特提斯的形成与消亡以及印度与亚洲的后续碰撞过程中经历了一系列复杂的俯冲事件。早期中生代的火成岩在南拉萨地下带内，之前被认为是由于邦公-怒江洋壳向南俯冲所致。然而，近年来越来越多的证据表明，它们是由于新特提斯板块向北俯冲而形成的。桑日群位于南拉萨地下带的中东段，因被视为早期新特提斯俯冲的产物而重要。桑日群的火山-沉积序列在南拉萨地下带的中东段不规则分布，东西走向延伸约800公里，从桑日到萨嘎县。沉积序列的特征和化石类型表明，桑日群是在大陆架的近海或浅海环境中沉积的。马木夏组的火山岩是一套1500米厚的玄武岩安山岩、安山岩和流纹岩，具有类似阿达基特的地球化学特征。
research objectiveCn: 在本文中，我们报告了来自南拉萨地下带中央段的BF火山岩（BFVRs）的锆石U-Pb年龄、全岩主要和微量元素数据，以及Sr–Nd–Pb–Hf同位素组成。我们的结果结合了对南拉萨地下带东段的近期研究，为早中生代南藏地区的新特提斯演化提供了更好的约束，并加深了对南拉萨地下带的地球动力学背景和演化的理解。
challengesCn: 不幸的是，关于新特提斯的演化知之甚少，特别是在早中生代早期的历史方面。
methodsCn: 经过岩石薄片检查，选择了五个样品（D01.1、D13.1、NX-1.1、NMDZ04-1 和 DZK06-1）进行激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA–ICP–MS）锆石U-Pb定年，另外四个样品（D01.1、D13.1、NX-1.1 和 DZK06-1）被选用于锆石Hf同位素分析。选择了二十三个样品（D01.1、D01.2、D03.1、D03.2、D04、D10、D13.1、D13.2、XWY-1至-6、NX-1.1、NX-1.2、Bn06、D0203、D0204、NMDZ04-1、NMDZ04-2、DZK06-1 和 DZK06-2）进行主要和微量元素分析。其中，九个样品（XWY-1、XWY-2、XWY-3、XWY-5、XWY-6、D03.1、D04、NX-1.1 和 D13.2）也被选用于Sr-Nd同位素分析，五个样品（XWY-1、XWY-2、XWY-3、XWY-5 和 XWY-6）进一步被选用于Pb同位素分析。
findingsCn: 因此，将我们的新数据与Kang等人（2014）和Wang等人（2016）的数据结合起来，我们提出BF形成于中三叠纪至早侏罗世，而不是早白垩世。

Verification.QuestionEn: Do the data collection techniques employed include the use of laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS) for zircon U-Pb dating?
Verification.QuestionCn: 所采用的数据收集技术是否包括使用激光烧蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）进行锆石U-Pb定年？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: What data collection methods are used to obtain isotopic geochemistry data in the field of porphyry mineralization systems?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在斑岩矿化系统领域，获取同位素地球化学数据的方法有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Rb-Sr, Sm-Nd isotopic data collection, Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf-S-Pb-H-O isotopic analysis
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: Rb-Sr, Sm-Nd 同位素数据收集，Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf-S-Pb-H-O 同位素分析

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Who are the main institutions involved in the testing and analysis of datasets in this domain?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 在这个领域中，主要参与数据集测试和分析的机构有哪些？
Concept Completion.AnswerEn: Chinese Academy of Geological Sciences, Institute of Geochemistry of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Institute of Geology and Geophysics, Beijing Research Institute of Uranium Geology, Peking University, Nanjing University, University of British Columbia's Pacific Centre for Isotope and Geochemical Research
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 中国地质科学院、中国科学院地球化学研究所、中国科学院地质与地球物理研究所、北京铀矿地质研究所、北京大学、南京大学、不列颠哥伦比亚大学太平洋同位素与地球化学研究中心

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used for analyzing isotopic compositions in geological samples?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于分析地质样品中同位素组成的数据收集方法的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used for analyzing isotopic compositions in geological samples is zircon U-Pb dating by laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA–ICP–MS), as mentioned in the field above.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于分析地质样品中同位素组成的数据收集方法的一个例子是激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA–ICP–MS）中的锆石U-Pb定年。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when collecting geochemical data from mineral samples?
Example.QuestionCn: 收集矿物样品的地球化学数据时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge faced when collecting geochemical data from mineral samples is the limited knowledge of the evolution of the Neo-Tethys, particularly during its early history in the early Mesozoic, which complicates the interpretation of the geodynamic setting and evolution of the area.
Example.AnswerCn: 收集矿物样品的地球化学数据时面临的一个挑战是对新特提斯的演化知识有限，特别是在早中生代早期的历史，这使得该地区的地球动力学背景和演化的解释变得复杂。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a dataset that includes geochemical analysis from a specific region?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个包含特定地区地球化学分析的数据集示例？
Example.AnswerEn: A dataset that includes geochemical analysis from a specific region could be one that contains zircon U-Pb ages, whole-rock major and trace element data, and Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotopic compositions from volcanic rocks in the central segment of the southern Lhasa subterrane, as described in the relevant papers section.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个包含特定区域地球化学分析的数据集可能包括来自南拉萨地下体中央段的火山岩的锆石U-Pb年龄、全岩主要和微量元素数据，以及Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf同位素组成，如相关论文部分所述。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of isotopic geochemical data used in porphyry mineralization systems evaluation?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于评估斑岩矿化系统的同位素地球化学数据的特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: whole-rock and single mineral Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf-S-Pb-H-O isotopic compositions, Rb-Sr isotopic data, Sm-Nd isotopic data, 40Ar/39Ar data from mica
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 全岩和单矿物的Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf-S-Pb-H-O同位素组成，Rb-Sr同位素数据，Sm-Nd同位素数据，来自云母的40Ar/39Ar数据。

Definition.QuestionEn: What is meant by 'fluid inclusion micro-element and microthermometric data' in the context of mineral exploration?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在矿产勘探的背景下，“流体包裹体微量元素和微温度数据”是指通过分析矿石中的流体包裹体来获取的微量元素组成和温度信息。这些数据可以帮助研究矿床的形成条件和流体的性质，从而为矿产资源的勘探提供重要线索。
Definition.AnswerEn: Fluid inclusion micro-element and microthermometric data refer to the analysis of tiny fluid pockets trapped within minerals. The micro-element data involves studying the elemental composition of these inclusions, while microthermometry focuses on measuring the temperatures at which the fluids within the inclusions undergo phase changes. These analyses provide valuable information about the conditions under which the minerals formed, aiding in the understanding of mineralization processes in geological systems.
Definition.AnswerCn: 流体包裹体微量元素和微热测定数据是指对矿物中被困的微小流体口袋进行分析。微量元素数据涉及研究这些包裹体的元素组成，而微热测定则侧重于测量包裹体内流体发生相变的温度。这些分析提供了有关矿物形成条件的宝贵信息，有助于理解地质系统中的矿化过程。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the methods used for collecting zircon U-Pb ages and microelement spectral data compare to those employed for Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotope geochemistry in terms of instrumentation and precision?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 收集锆石U-Pb年龄和微量元素光谱数据的方法与用于Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf同位素地球化学的方法在仪器和精度方面有何比较？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Zircon U-Pb ages and microelement spectral data are collected using laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA-ICP-MS), which provides high precision for dating and elemental analysis. In contrast, Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotope geochemistry involves different instruments such as thermal ionization mass spectrometers (TIMS) and multi-collector inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometers (MC-ICP-MS), which are specialized for isotope ratio precision.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb年龄和微量元素光谱数据是通过激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）收集的，这种方法提供了高精度的年代测定和元素分析。相比之下，Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf同位素地球化学涉及不同的仪器，如热离子化质谱仪（TIMS）和多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱仪（MC-ICP-MS），这些仪器专门用于同位素比率的精确测定。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in the data collection process when using laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA–ICP–MS) for zircon dating in complex geological settings?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在复杂地质环境中使用激光烧蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA–ICP–MS）进行锆石定年时，数据收集过程中可能会出现哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges in using LA-ICP-MS for zircon dating may include ensuring accurate sample selection and preparation, accounting for potential contamination, dealing with complex mineral matrices that may affect isotope ratio measurements, and interpreting data in the context of the intricate geological history of regions like the Lhasa terrane.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法（LA-ICP-MS）进行锆石定年时可能面临的挑战包括确保样品选择和准备的准确性、考虑潜在的污染、处理可能影响同位素比率测量的复杂矿物矩阵，以及在像拉萨地块这样的地区中解释数据时考虑复杂的地质历史。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the integration of field geological surveys and laboratory-based spectrometry analyses enhance the predictive evaluation of mineralization systems in regions like Tibet and Yunnan?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 现场地质调查与实验室光谱分析的结合如何增强对像西藏和云南这样的地区矿化系统的预测评估？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The integration of field surveys, such as alteration-structure mapping, with laboratory-based analyses, including isotopic and elemental data from ICP-MS and other spectrometers, allows for a comprehensive understanding of mineralization patterns. This combined approach aids in identifying key geological features and processes, enhancing the accuracy of predictive models for mineral exploration in complex terrains.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 现场调查（如变质结构绘图）与实验室分析（包括来自ICP-MS和其他光谱仪的同位素和元素数据）的结合，能够全面理解矿化模式。这种综合方法有助于识别关键的地质特征和过程，提高在复杂地形中矿产勘探预测模型的准确性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors might influence the choice of analytical instruments for obtaining zircon U-Pb ages and isotopic compositions in geological studies?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响选择分析仪器以获取锆石U-Pb年龄和同位素组成的地质研究的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of analytical instruments is influenced by the specific isotopic and elemental data required, the precision and accuracy needed for the study, the availability of instruments such as LA-ICP-MS, and the complexities of the geological samples being analyzed.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 分析仪器的选择受到所需特定同位素和元素数据、研究所需的精度和准确性、可用仪器（如激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱法）以及所分析的地质样品复杂性的影响。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might there be challenges in fully understanding the early history of the Neo-Tethys during the early Mesozoic period?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在早期中生代时期，全面理解新特提斯的早期历史可能面临挑战的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Challenges in understanding the early history of the Neo-Tethys may arise from the lack of comprehensive data, the complex geological processes involved, and limited access to well-preserved rock samples from that era.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 理解新特提斯早期历史的挑战可能源于数据的不全面、复杂的地质过程以及对该时代保存良好的岩石样本的有限获取。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What might be the reasons for selecting specific rock samples for isotopic and elemental analysis in studies of the southern Lhasa subterrane?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在对南拉萨地下体的研究中，选择特定岩石样本进行同位素和元素分析的原因可能包括以下几点：
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Specific rock samples are selected based on their representativeness of the geological features of interest, their preservation state, and the likelihood of them providing meaningful isotopic and elemental data relevant to the research objectives.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 特定的岩石样本是根据其对感兴趣的地质特征的代表性、保存状态以及提供与研究目标相关的有意义的同位素和元素数据的可能性进行选择的。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of utilizing a wide range of isotope geochemistry data from different third-party sources on the understanding of the mineralization processes in the Tibetan Plateau?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用来自不同第三方来源的广泛同位素地球化学数据对理解青藏高原的矿化过程可能产生的结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing a wide range of isotope geochemistry data allows for a comprehensive understanding of mineralization processes by integrating diverse geological histories and isotopic compositions. It can lead to better constraints on tectonic events and enhance the accuracy of mineralization models, ultimately improving the prediction of potential mineralization zones.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用广泛的同位素地球化学数据可以全面理解矿化过程，通过整合多样的地质历史和同位素组成，能够更好地约束构造事件，并提高矿化模型的准确性，最终改善潜在矿化区的预测。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How might the combination of field-based geological surveys with advanced isotopic analysis techniques impact the evaluation of deep mineralization systems in regions like Tibet and Yunnan?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 现场地质调查与先进同位素分析技术的结合，可能会对像西藏和云南这样的地区深部矿化系统的评估产生影响。
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Combining field-based geological surveys with advanced isotopic analysis techniques can significantly enhance the evaluation of deep mineralization systems by providing detailed spatial and compositional data. This integration improves the ability to interpret subsurface structures and processes, leading to more precise targeting of mineral exploration efforts in complex geological settings.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 将基于实地的地质调查与先进的同位素分析技术相结合，可以显著增强对深部矿化系统的评估，通过提供详细的空间和成分数据。这种整合提高了对地下结构和过程的解释能力，从而在复杂地质环境中更精确地定位矿产勘探工作。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What could be the consequences of employing high-resolution spectrometric techniques in the collection of microelement data on the prediction and assessment of porphyry mineralization targets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 采用高分辨率光谱技术收集微量元素数据对预测和评估斑岩矿化靶区可能产生的后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Employing high-resolution spectrometric techniques in the collection of microelement data can lead to more accurate and detailed geochemical characterizations of mineral samples. This precision enhances the ability to identify subtle geochemical signatures associated with porphyry mineralization, thus improving the prediction and assessment of such targets in complex geological terrains.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 采用高分辨率光谱技术收集微量元素数据可以更准确和详细地进行矿物样品的地球化学特征分析。这种精确性增强了识别与斑岩矿化相关的微妙地球化学特征的能力，从而改善了在复杂地质环境中对这些目标的预测和评估。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the objectives behind collecting zircon U-Pb ages and trace element data in the context of understanding the geological evolution of the Tibetan Plateau?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 收集锆石U-Pb年龄和微量元素数据的目标是什么，以便理解青藏 Plateau 的地质演化？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The objective is to provide improved constraints on the evolution of the Neo-Tethys in southern Tibet during the early Mesozoic and to gain a better understanding of the geodynamic setting and evolution of the southern Lhasa subterrane.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是提供对早中生代南藏地区新特提斯演化的改进约束，并更好地理解南拉萨地下体的地球动力学背景和演化。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What goal does the petrographic examination and subsequent selection of samples for isotopic and elemental analysis serve in geological research?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 岩石薄片的岩石学检查及随后选择样本进行同位素和元素分析在地质研究中有什么目标？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to systematically study the geochemical signatures and isotopic characteristics of selected rock samples to deduce the timing, nature, and processes involved in the geological evolution of specific terranes, contributing to a broader understanding of regional tectonic and magmatic histories.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是系统地研究选定岩石样品的地球化学特征和同位素特征，以推断特定地块的地质演化过程、性质和时间，从而为更广泛理解区域构造和岩浆历史做出贡献。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instruments and procedures are utilized to collect and analyze zircon U-Pb age and trace element data in this field?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在这个领域中，收集和分析锆石U-Pb年龄和微量元素数据所使用的仪器和程序包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The collection and analysis of zircon U-Pb age and trace element data involve using instruments such as laser ablation inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (LA–ICP–MS) and multi-receiver inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (MC-ICPMS). These tools allow for precise measurements of isotopic compositions and trace elements in zircon samples to understand their geologic history.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 锆石U-Pb年龄和微量元素数据的收集与分析涉及使用激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA–ICP–MS）和多接收器电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICPMS）等仪器。这些工具能够精确测量锆石样品中的同位素组成和微量元素，以了解它们的地质历史。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What methodological steps are involved in performing field-based geochemical surveys and the subsequent lab analysis for isotopic and elemental composition?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 进行基于现场的地球化学调查及随后的同位素和元素组成实验室分析所涉及的方法步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Field-based geochemical surveys involve systematic sampling of rocks and minerals, followed by detailed petrographic examination. Samples are then analyzed in laboratories using various spectrometric instruments like the Agilent 7500a ICP-MS, JEOL JXA-8100 electron probe, and Finnigan Triton thermal ionization mass spectrometer, among others. These steps aim to accurately determine the isotopic and elemental composition of the collected samples.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 基于现场的地球化学调查涉及对岩石和矿物的系统采样，随后进行详细的岩石学检查。样品随后在实验室中使用各种光谱仪器进行分析，如Agilent 7500a ICP-MS、JEOL JXA-8100电子探针和Finnigan Triton热离子化质谱仪等。这些步骤旨在准确确定所收集样品的同位素和元素组成。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do the conditions and environments of Tibet and Yunnan influence the data collection methods for geological surveys in this domain?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 西藏和云南的条件和环境如何影响该领域地质调查的数据收集方法？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The conditions and environments of Tibet and Yunnan influence data collection methods by necessitating the use of specialized equipment and techniques, such as wide-band seismic observation data collection and alteration-structure mapping, to effectively collect and analyze geological data in these complex terrains.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 西藏和云南的条件和环境影响数据收集方法， necessitating the use of specialized equipment and techniques, such as wide-band seismic observation data collection and alteration-structure mapping, 以有效地在这些复杂地形中收集和分析地质数据。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might researchers expect difficulties in pinpointing precise geochronological data in complex geological terrains like the Tibetan Plateau?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员可能会预期在像青藏 Plateau 这样复杂的地质地形中确定精确的地质年代数据会遇到困难。
Expectation.AnswerEn: The Tibetan Plateau, with its multiple terranes including the Qiangtang, Lhasa, and Himalaya, has undergone a complex series of geological events such as subduction and collision. This complexity, combined with the early history of the Neo-Tethys, poses challenges in obtaining precise geochronological data, especially due to the irregular distribution and varying compositions of volcanic and sedimentary sequences like those in the Sangri Group.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 青藏高原拥有多个地质单元，包括羌塘、拉萨和喜马拉雅，经历了一系列复杂的地质事件，如俯冲和碰撞。这种复杂性，加上新特提斯的早期历史，使得获得精确的地质年代学数据面临挑战，尤其是由于像桑日组这样的火山和沉积序列的不规则分布和成分差异。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What reasons could there be for researchers to encounter significant challenges in obtaining comprehensive isotopic data for early Mesozoic igneous rocks in southern Tibet?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 研究人员在获取南藏早中生代火成岩的全面同位素数据时可能遇到的重大挑战有哪些原因？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The challenges in obtaining comprehensive isotopic data for early Mesozoic igneous rocks may stem from the limited understanding of the Neo-Tethys evolution, especially its early history. Additionally, the diverse geological settings and the presence of volcanic rocks with complex signatures, such as those with adakite-like geochemical characteristics, further complicate the isotopic analysis.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 获取早期中生代火成岩的全面同位素数据面临的挑战可能源于对新特提斯演化，特别是其早期历史的理解有限。此外，多样的地质背景和具有复杂特征的火山岩（例如具有类似阿达基特的地球化学特征的岩石）进一步复杂化了同位素分析。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you assess the challenges involved in collecting comprehensive geochemical data from diverse geological conditions, such as those found in Tibet and Yunnan regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估在收集来自不同地质条件的全面地球化学数据时所面临的挑战，例如在西藏和云南地区的挑战？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Collecting comprehensive geochemical data from diverse geological conditions, such as in Tibet and Yunnan, presents significant challenges due to the varied terrain and complex geological history. However, the use of advanced analytical techniques and collaboration with multiple research institutions helps mitigate these challenges by providing extensive datasets and multiple perspectives.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 在西藏和云南等多样地质条件下收集全面的地球化学数据面临着重大挑战，因为地形复杂且地质历史悠久。然而，利用先进的分析技术和与多个研究机构的合作，有助于缓解这些挑战，从而提供广泛的数据集和多角度的视野。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the isotopic geochemistry data can be accurately collected from such diverse sources and instruments.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白如何能从如此多样的来源和仪器中准确收集同位素地球化学数据。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection involves using third-party testing to gather isotopic geochemistry data from various sources and instruments, such as agilent7500a-ICP-MS, Finnigan Triton thermal ionization mass spectrometer, and CAMECA IMS-1280 secondary ion mass spectrometer (SIMS), across multiple institutions and laboratories.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集涉及使用第三方测试从多个来源和仪器（如Agilent 7500a-ICP-MS、Finnigan Triton热离子质谱仪和CAMECA IMS-1280次级离子质谱仪（SIMS））收集同位素地球化学数据，跨多个机构和实验室。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about the challenges involved in collecting and integrating data from different geophysical and geochemical methods.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对从不同的地球物理和地球化学方法中收集和整合数据所涉及的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The challenges might include ensuring consistency and accuracy across different data types like zircon U-Pb ages, Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf isotopic compositions, and seismic observation data collected from various locations and instruments, as well as integrating data from institutions in China and Canada.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 挑战可能包括确保来自不同数据类型的连贯性和准确性，例如锆石U-Pb年龄、Sr-Nd-Pb-Hf同位素组成，以及来自不同地点和仪器收集的地震观测数据，以及整合来自中国和加拿大的机构数据。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the specific data collection methods contribute to understanding the tectonic evolution of the Lhasa subterrane.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白具体的数据收集方法如何有助于理解拉萨地下体的构造演化。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection methods, including zircon U-Pb dating, Hf isotopic analysis, and major and trace element analysis, provide constraints on the evolution of the Neo-Tethys in southern Tibet, offering insights into the geodynamic setting and tectonic history of the Lhasa subterrane.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法，包括锆石U-Pb定年、Hf同位素分析以及主要和微量元素分析，为南藏地区新特提斯的演化提供了约束，揭示了拉萨地下体的地球动力学背景和构造历史。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please evaluate the challenges of collecting and analyzing in-situ mineral data using advanced spectrometry techniques in remote regions such as Tibet and Yunnan.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 评估在遥远地区如西藏和云南使用先进光谱技术收集和分析原位矿物数据的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Collecting and analyzing in-situ mineral data in remote regions like Tibet and Yunnan using advanced spectrometry techniques presents challenges such as logistical constraints, ensuring equipment functionality in harsh environments, and obtaining representative samples. Advanced instruments like laser ablation ICP-MS are crucial for precise elemental and isotopic measurements, but require careful calibration and maintenance in field conditions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在像西藏和云南这样的偏远地区收集和分析原位矿物数据，使用先进的光谱技术面临着诸多挑战，例如后勤限制、确保设备在恶劣环境中的功能以及获取具有代表性的样本。激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）等先进仪器对于精确的元素和同位素测量至关重要，但在野外条件下需要仔细的校准和维护。
